This question illustrates how JSXGraph can be used to require a student to "Draw a shape", and the data input can be evaluated according to a criteria

One side of a parallelogram is drawn on this centimetre grid. The parallelogram does not have any right angles. Complete the parallelogram by dragging the dots so that it has an area 24 cm2
